title: Chotto dake Ai ga Omoi Dark Elf ga Isekai kara Oikaketekita

synonyms: A Dark Elf with a Slightly Overwhelming Love Chased Me All the Way from Another World
alternative_titles.en: Yandere Dark Elf: She Chased Me All the Way From Another World!
alternative_titles.ja: ちょっとだけ愛が重いダークエルフが異世界から追いかけてきた

synopsis:
When high school student Hinata Sunohara was summoned to another world to defeat the Demon Lord, he promised to marry Mariabelle, a beautiful dark elf. But once his mission ended, Hinata was returned to Earth, leaving Mariabelle devastated.

After a month back in Japan, Hinata's life has seemingly gone back to normal. However, everything changes again when Mariabelle suddenly appears in his room! Swearing to remain by his side forever, she begins living with him. As her obsessive love grows by the day, Mariabelle wishes to protect Hinata from any threat and ensure that he only has eyes for her.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
